title: ArroBoat V2
description: Dual-unit wireless RC airboat system featuring a controller and boat communicating through NRF24L01 modules. Designed for stable real-time control and water-resistant hardware integration.

title: Smart Proximity Alert System
description: Distance-based safety alert that uses ultrasonic sensing, RGB LEDs, and buzzers to indicate proximity levels. Designed for robotics, automation, and parking systems.

title: Smart Proximity Counter V2
description: Enhanced version of the proximity system with motion-triggered image capture using ESP32-CAM. Detects nearby objects, records short video clips, and logs entries automatically.

title: Automation Ticketing Workflow
description: Power Automate workflow for creating, tracking, and closing jobsite tickets. Integrates Microsoft Teams notifications, timestamping, and automatic status updates via email and SMS.

title: CANI Troubleshooting System
description: CANI (Check, Analyze, Notify, Improve) is a diagnostic automation system built to streamline technical issue management. Integrates Excel tracking, SharePoint storage, and Teams-based alerts.

title: Multi-Camera ESP32-CAM CCTV System
description: Distributed network surveillance system built with multiple ESP32-CAM modules streaming to a Raspberry Pi dashboard. Supports simultaneous live feeds and future cloud backup expansion.

title: RC Car with Ultrasonic Obstacle Avoidance
description: Custom-built RC car combining Bluetooth remote control and ultrasonic-based autonomous obstacle avoidance. Uses motor drivers for direction control and servo-based steering.

title: Arduino Timer (NUCLEO Board)
description: Embedded timer project using the STM32 Nucleo board to perform timed LED operations with millisecond precision, showcasing hardware-level programming and interrupt handling.

title: IoT LED Control & Remote Diagnostics Board
description: A Wi-Fi and Bluetooth-enabled IoT board that allows remote LED control and status monitoring. Displays live diagnostics via serial communication for real-time error tracking.

title: Smart Mini Trash Can (Canny)
description: Interactive mini trash can that opens automatically when detecting motion. Features servo-controlled lid actuation and LED status feedback for power and operation states.

title: Ultrasonic Radar / UAV Sonar
description: Rotating radar-style sonar that uses a servo-mounted ultrasonic sensor to detect surrounding obstacles and visualize them on a display or serial monitor. Simulates UAV object detection.

title: Gmail Automation Workflow
description: Automation workflow integrating Google Voice with Microsoft Power Automate for two-way communication. Sends automatic ticket confirmations and real-time status updates via SMS.
